name: Lotion Holster
description:
This lotion holster is made out of cordova fabric, edged in cotton seam binding.  The belt is made out of nylon webbing.

Each holster comes with an empty PVC opaque 8oz bottle to fill with a lotion of your choice.

Sizing is in regard to the belt size; details are as follows:
Small
Medium
Large
X-Large
XX-Large

name: Deep Tissue Glide
description:
This item is for deep tissue work or for a slow deep glide in massage therapy.  This item works *wonderful* on hairy guys.

This item is sold in 2oz containers.  To avoid cross contamination, you will need to scoop out the amount desired and place in another container, discarding any unused product.  

It is unscented, but does have an aroma of the natural cocoa butter.

Ingredients: Cocoa Butter, Safflower or Avocado oil, Beesewax, Vitamin E

name: Silk
description:
This is a lightweight massage product that has the consistency of pudding.  I add Lemongrass oil, which gives it a lemony scent.

It leaves the skin so silky smooth and soaks in very well.  It has a little bit of a grip to it so it slows down your stroke, but has a very good glide consistency.  It's lighter than the deep glide, and a little bit goes a long way.

Ingredients: Beesewax, Grapeseed Oil, Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Coconut Oil and Apricot kernel.
Essential oils that are added for scent: Lemongrass, Spearmint, Peppermint and Ginger

8 ounces
